source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Tell Me a Story: a Guide to Traditional Storytelling

visible_instructors.title: Paul Jenkins' Brilliantio
visible_instructors.name: Paul Jenkins'
visible_instructors.job_title: Powerful Storytelling for Professionals and Organisations

visible_instructors.title: Nicola-Jane le Breton
visible_instructors.name: Nicola-Jane
visible_instructors.job_title: Storytelling and Writing Instructor at storyweavers.net.au

items.headline: Awaken Your Inner Storyteller With Workshop Proven Techniques
objectives_summary: Awaken your inner storyteller
Embrace your own storytelling style
Overcome inner obstacles to telling stories

items.title: How to Write an Award-Winning SF short story

visible_instructors.name: Harry
visible_instructors.title: Harry Dewulf
visible_instructors.job_title: Literary Editor and Story Development Expert.

items.headline: Strategy and technique for writing the right story, entering and winning the award.
objectives_summary: Strategy and technique for short story writing
Strategy and technique for conceiving science fiction stories
Strategy and technique for entering and winning short story writing competitions and awards

items.title: Alcohol Ink Wildflowers
items.headline: Learning new techniques to expand your creative practice
objectives_summary: Learn alcohol ink mixed media techniques to create whimsical flowerscapes

items.title: 21 Calming Creative Thinking Exercises Before Falling Asleep

visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose
visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills
visible_instructors.name: Tatiana

items.headline: Breakthrough your creative thinking blocks with different creative thinking exercises at night before going to sleep.
objectives_summary: Spark creative ideas immediately
Get a better night's sleep by implementing the different techniques in this course
Become more creative before the end of the day

items.title: Screenplay 101 - From Idea to Screen
items.headline: Anyone can learn to write a screenplay -- even you!
objectives_summary: They will learn to take an idea and turn it into a feature-length movie screenplay.

items.title: Acrylic Pours
items.headline: Creating beautiful abstract acrylic art
objectives_summary: Creating beautiful abstract acrylic art by doing Acrylic Pours.

items.title: Learn How To Juggle and How To Make Your Own Juggling Balls
items.headline: Always wanted to learn how to juggle?  Are You a creative person?  Then this course is the perfect fit for you!
objectives_summary: How to make and design your own juggling balls from scratch
Learn how to juggle (Beginners level)
Learn different practice techniques and exercises for improving juggling skills

items.title: Fantasy Writing: How to Craft a Best-Selling Fantasy Novel
items.headline: Want to be a fantasy author? Learn from experts how to build an awesome adventure story and start your writing career!
objectives_summary: Creative writing, writing, fantasy writing, fantasy novel

items.title: Creative Writing: How to Write Amazing Description
items.headline: Create lush, vivid scenes for your readers, artists, actors, and producers.
objectives_summary: You will identify areas in your stories where description can be improved, increasing your chances of landing an agent or selling well as an independent writer.
Learn from an award-winning author with nine novels published by Penguin Random House, Simon & Schuster, and more

items.title: Find Time to Write and Publish Short Stories
items.headline: A Ten-Step Plan for Writing and Publishing Stories
objectives_summary: You'll establish a writing habit
You'll be able to design, draft, and finish a short story
You'll know how to research opportunities for publication and send your work out into the world

items.title: Twisting Balloon Sculptures-an Introductory Course

visible_instructors.title: Dan Cutchen
visible_instructors.job_title: Musician, Professor, Entertainer and Creative Type
visible_instructors.name: Dan

items.headline: Entertain!  Create!  Have FUN learning how to make balloon sculptures and balloon animals.
objectives_summary: Upon completion of this course, a student will be able to quickly create many fun balloon sculptures along with patter, jokes and funny routines.
Students will have the confidence to entertain people individually and in front of small and large audiences.

items.title: Complete Comedy MASTERCLASS: Humor & Stand-Up Comedy Writing
items.headline: Learn humor and comedy: everything from understanding humor, to comedy writing, to performing stand-up comedy.
objectives_summary: Become the fastest and funniest version of yourself!
Come up with hilarious original material
Analyze other comedians and understand how they trigger laughter

items.title: How to Use Amazon KDP's Sales Reporting & Promotion Tools

visible_instructors.name: D. D.
visible_instructors.title: D. D. Scott
visible_instructors.job_title: Int'l Bestselling Author and Writing & Publishing Coach

items.headline: Building and Tracking a Global Readership
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, students will be able to track their ebook sales around the world using Amazon KDP's Sales Reporting Tools
At the end of the course, students will have setup their Amazon Author Page and be able to use its tools to connect with readers
At the end of the course, students will be able to run promotions for their books using Amazon KDP's Promote and Advertising Tools, growing their readership globally

items.title: Learn The Fundamentals of Screenwriting & Story Structure
items.headline: Write a Shortfilm you CAN SHOOT on a Budget of Coffee & Donuts!
objectives_summary: Screenwriting & Story Structure with a focus on Short Films
Proper Screenplay Formatting
The Fundamental Elements Needed to Write a Great Story

items.title: How to Break into Acting and Book the Job!
items.headline: From getting an agent to advanced audition technique, learn how to go from the casting office to the set.
objectives_summary: Business of Acting: How to set yourself up in the entertainment industry to be ready to head out on auditions.
Audition Technique: The skills required to ace your audition and book TV/Film work.
On-Set Advice: The important tips and tricks for ensuring your first day on set is a successful one.

items.title: Find Time to Write Your Novel
items.headline: This course shows you how to find time to write AND breaks novel writing into small steps. Led by a published novelist.
objectives_summary: You'll know how to create characters, plan and write a novel
You'll know how to find time to write your novel
